accept_privacy_policy_notice: By registering, you agree to our <0>privacy policy</0>.
accept_terms_and_policy_notice: By registering, you agree to our <0>terms and conditions</0> and our <1>privacy policy</1>.
accept_terms_notice: By registering, you agree to our <0>terms and conditions</0>.
action_irreversible_warning: Proceed with caution, this action cannot be undone.
administrator_role_description: All of the above, plus managing the site, assigning roles, and deleting accounts.
avatar_file_requirements: Maximum size: 2MB. PNG or JPG only.
confirm_account_deletion: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
confirm_close_report_irreversible: This action will close the report and cannot be undone.
confirm_comment_deletion_irreversible: Are you sure you want to delete this comment? This action is irreversible.
confirm_page_deletion_irreversible: Are you sure you want to delete this page? This action is irreversible.
confirm_post_deletion_irreversible: Are you sure you want to delete this post? This action is irreversible.
delete_account_and_all_resources: Delete your account and all its resources
delete_user_account_and_data: Delete the user account and all associated data.
disable_account_ends_all_sessions: Disabling an account blocks login and ends all active sessions associated with it.
edit_comment_content: Edit the content of your comment.
edit_post_content: Edit the content of your post.
empty_field_random_slug: If left empty, the page will be saved with a random identifier.
enter_details_to_create_an_account: Enter your details below to create your account.
enter_email_and_password_to_login: Enter your email address and password to log in.
enter_email_for_password_reset_link: Enter your email to receive a password reset link.
enter_new_email_for_verification_link: Enter the new email address where you want to receive the account verification link.
enter_privileged_user_password: To continue, enter your password as a privileged user.
fill_fields_to_register_user: Fill in the fields to register a new user.
heading: Heading
language_cannot_be_changed: The language cannot be changed once the page is created.
manage_profile_and_account_settings: Manage your profile and account settings.
manage_social_network_settings: Manage and configure the social network.
moderator_role_description: All User permissions, plus managing posts and other users' accounts.
new_verification_link_sent: A new verification link has been sent to the email address you provided during registration.
no_pages_created_yet: No pages have been created yet.
no_reports_found: There are no reports at the moment.
password_setup_link_will_be_sent: A link will be sent to the registered email so the user can set their password.
random_username_if_empty: If left empty, the record will be saved with a random username.
replace_password_with_random: Replace the current password with a random one.
report_description: Briefly describe the reason for the report.
report_snapshot_author: Author snapshot at time of report
report_snapshot_content: Content snapshot at time of report
resolution_note_placeholder: Describe the decision taken to resolve this report.
resolution_note_required: You must provide a resolution note to close the report.
search_by_username_or_id: Search by username or user ID...
secure_area_confirm_password: This is a secure area of the application. Please confirm your password before continuing.
send_password_reset_email: Send the user a password reset email.
single_special_page_per_language: Only one About, Terms and Conditions, Privacy Policy, and Community Guidelines page is allowed per language.
subtitle: Subtitle
title: Title
toggle_user_registration: Enable or disable new user registration.
update_profile_info: Update your username, avatar, and email address.
use_strong_random_password: Make sure your account uses a long, random password to stay secure.
user_follows_no_one: This user is not following anyone yet.
user_has_commented_in_post: <0>{{username}}</0> has <1>commented</1> on a post you are participating in.
user_has_no_followers: This user has no followers yet.
user_role_description: Manage their account, publish posts, comment, and follow others.
verification_email_will_be_sent: A verification email will be sent to the new address.
verify_your_email_using_sent_link: Please verify your email address by clicking the link we just sent you.
welcome_message: Connect, share, and discover what others are thinking.
